_comment: This file contains responses only for full-time program. Can be modified for further changes.

patterns: What is the medical check-up for?
What documents do I need for the Student’s Pass?
Where do I go for the medical check-up?
Do I need a medical check-up if I already did one in my home country?
responses:
**Medical Check-Up & Student’s Pass Formalities**
*(For International Students only)*

**Students are highly encouraged to arrive in Singapore at least two weeks before the start of classes** to complete their Student’s Pass formalities and avoid delays in attending classes.
If you have already completed your medical check-up in your home country, you do **not** need to undergo another one in Singapore. 
To prevent delays in your **Student’s Pass issuance**, please send your **overseas medical check-up report** to **stpformalities_singapore@jcu.edu.au**.
Please be **punctual** for your appointment.

**Date:** 06 January 2025
**Time:** 07 January 2025, 09:00 AM – 03:00 PM *(Last registration at 02:00 PM)*
**Venue:** Block C, James Cook University Singapore

**Compulsory Documents to Bring:**
Passport
IPA Letter

For any additional questions, feel free to reach out to the university!

patterns: What is the Student’s Pass formalities process?
When should I complete my Student’s Pass formalities?
What happens if I arrive late for Student’s Pass processing?
How do I know my Student’s Pass appointment date?
Who do I contact for Student’s Pass formalities?
responses:
**Student’s Pass Completion of Formalities (COMPULSORY)**
*(For International Students only)*

**Students are strongly advised** to arrive in Singapore at least **two weeks before the course start date** to complete their Student’s Pass formalities on time.
If you **arrive later** than the recommended time, you **may not be able to join your classes on time** as Student’s Pass processing appointments depend on ICA's availability.
You will receive an **email from STP Formalities** (*stpformalities-singapore@jcu.edu.au*) with details about your **Student’s Pass collection appointment**.

For any concerns, feel free to contact STP Formalities via email!
